title: Black Home Vermillion Monastery v1 0-TE
description:
TE 2013 PRESENTS

ANOTHER FINE RELEASE

Release: Black Home Vermillion Monastery v1.0 (c) 2013 Valkyria Games
Date: 08/13/2013

Cracked By: Twisted EndZ
Release Type: Other: Armadillo, Precracked
RELEASE NOTES

The apparition of your loved one stands before you

The rain comes down so hard it stings, and the lightning flashes
to illuminate the darkened windows of the decrepit monastary you
stand before

Inside this maze of ruins, is your loved one, lost, trapped, and
alone. No one will come to your aid. No one will offer you any
support, or weapons, or tools, save those you must find yourself

Can you solve the mystery of the Monastary? Can you uncover the
secrets contained within? Brave the unknown terrors inside, find
hidden rooms and secret chambers, and unlock the mysterious past
before the sun comes up, and you may get out alive!

Feautures:

Dark and Spooky atmosphere that will keep you on your toes!
Hidden Items!
Secret Areas!
Two different endings!

For More Info Visit: <a href="
http://valkyriagames.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://valkyriagames.com/</a>

SCENE NOTICE:

Upon Winrar 5 beta becoming final, TE is going to be using the
new RAR5 as the new standard for RAR required archival. The
benefits on using RAR5 is well worth the change. If you do not
upgrade to Winrar v5.xx, then you will NOT be able to extract
data from *.r?? files. Visit rarlab.com for more information on
the new format

TE Release Filename: tbhvm10x.zip

INSTALLATION NOTES

Install BHVM.exe. After installation copy precracked exe from
the Crack folder to the installed folder of Black Home:
Vermillion Monastery, making sure to overwrite the existing file
You now have a full version of Black Home: Vermillion Monastery!

VERSION NOTE:

No version information was found. Since this is the first
release of this game, its been tagged as v1.0

Thats it! Enjoy
